It is characterized by its striking, velvety foliage with deep green, almost metallic sheen. The plant produces small, inconspicuous flowers that are typically clustered in dense inflorescences. It is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its attractive foliage and adaptability to various growing conditions.
